Package voltage.core

Class VoltageToggle

java.lang.Object
voltage.core.VoltageComponent
voltage.core.VoltageButton
voltage.core.VoltageToggle
public class VoltageToggle
extends VoltageButton
A 2-state toggle button. Toggle buttons can be grouped together by using a group id. If a button has a group id, pushing it, will un-toggle another button in the group. Only one button within a group can be toggled at the same time. See the Cherry Audio Oscillator to see group ids in use.
